body.name: Amazon Essentials Women's Mid Rise Curvy Skinny Jean
features: CURVY SKINNY FIT: Curvier through the hip with a narrower waist. Snug fit through hip, thigh, and leg.
HIGH STRETCH DENIM: Cut from cotton-blend denim with added stretch for all-day comfort and better fit.
ESSENTIAL SKINNY JEAN: These mid-rise skinny jeans will be your go-to wardrobe essential. The slim and flattering silhouette allows for endless styling options.

DETAILS: Authentic five-pocket styling, zip fly, shank button closure and skinny leg. Available in short, regular, and tall inseam lengths. All denim is unique and will vary in color due to wash, finish, and dye.
INSEAM: Offered in 3 lengths - Short 27", Regular 29", & Long 31" each with a 5" leg opening on US size 6.
body.description: An Amazon brand - This skinny jean features classic five-pocket styling and a bit of stretch for added comfort Amazon Essentials is focused on creating affordable, high-quality, and long-lasting everyday clothing you can rely on. Our line of women's apparel includes cashmere sweaters, fleece and down jackets, and more, including plus-size options. Our consistent sizing takes the guesswork out of shopping, and each piece is put to the test to maintain the highest standards in quality and comfort.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #1,726 in Our Brands (See Top 100 in Our Brands) #152 in Women's Jeans

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fit well and comfy
reviews.reviewText: They run a little short so I wish I had gotten a long size but other than that they're great jeans for the price, will definitely buy again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and comfy but absolutely no stretch!
reviews.reviewText: These jeans are perfect for those that are smaller in the waist than they are in the hips/glute area. I get tons of compliments, they’re comfy and amazing quality. The length is perfect for my 5’2 height; they hit right at my ankle. The only thing I want to warn is that the waistband has NO stretch. I still wear them but as someone who has become accustomed to a stretchy waistband, I was initially put off my how “tight” they felt around my waist. But they do fit and look amazing, just make sure your measurements are accurate and don’t expect much wiggle room in the waist.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I think the jeans are okay. They do run small so I’m glad I ordered one size bigger. And wow, they DO stink, as others mentioned. It’s a chemical smell. I just washed them on the extra long cycle and they still smell. ??? It made the other clothing in the dryer, kind of stink a bit too, so be aware. I haven’t worn them yet, so I may need to update if anything unexpected happens with them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars THIGHS THE LIMIT WITH THESE PANTS
reviews.reviewText: Ah, the sweet siren call of a fresh pair of pants. I succumbed to the allure in April 2022, and was thrilled with my purchase. The color was perfect, the fit was fantastic, and the fabric felt like a whisper against my skin. But alas, my euphoria was short-lived.The pants, it seems, were not designed with the thunder-thighed among us in mind. My thighs, robust and sturdy as they are, took one look at these pants and said, "Challenge accepted." And thus began a battle of attrition.The pants put up a valiant fight, but my thighs, they are seasoned warriors. After a 20 months of frequent wear, the friction between my thighs and the pants created a chasm that no seamstress could mend. I now sport a pair of pants with gaping holes, a testament to the power of thigh rub.But let's not be all doom and gloom. These pants definitely held up in terms of quality as compared to the $29 price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wow! I don't know why I'm shocked but I am!
reviews.reviewText: I wear a size 18W in Gloria Vanderbilts and Kohl's store brand. Amazon recommended size 18. But based on the reviews I sized up to 20 and am VERY glad I did.I'm in the process of losing weight. I'm 5'8" and 230lbs. I have a big round butt, hips and thighs and a smaller waist and usually have that annoying waste gap. No so much with these. I have oddly short legs and so the regular hits the top of my feet. It's not sloppy long. I'm SHOCKED these fit so nice. I don't know why but I am. I had zero expectations of these.I would say the only thing is that there is very little stretch to the waist. They just fit without feeling like they're gonna cut me in two- if they have as much cotton as they say- it should stretch a little over the day and be just right. But I haven't washed them and I'm kinda afraid to. lolHonestly? I looked at so many skinny jeans I didn't discern between the midrise and the high rise waist. I think these will be fine but I'm also going to try the highrise waist. Probably keep both because I'm lost quite a bit of weight now and have zero wardrobe in the pants dept.I like these because they don't seem to smash down the butt and make it look flat. For my first pair of skinny jeans- They are extremely comfortable. I'm actually quite excited about these. The PRICE Is phenomenal! You can't find a pair that cheap- maybe WalMart- but I live in a small town so the selection is always nothing.CHECK Your measurements!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2022
reviews.reviewText: ***UPDATE: I have worn these jeans about 1x/week after washing 3 times to start. Even with weekly washings there is still a slight note of that smell left. I only wear them for work since I don't care if my work clothes get dirty. They look nice enough that I would wear for everyday if it weren't for the odor and the fact that they don't hold their shape well after a few hours of wear. They are fairly comfortable, though. Overall, I sold NOT buy again unless they were about 1/2 price, and then only for pants I don't care to get dirty.***If I am ever able to actually put these jeans on I will come back and edit my review to update fit & feel. But, I have washed these THREE times and they still smell very strongly of something akin to dry cleaning chemicals. They made my whole laundry room STINK. I'm afraid to try them on yet because I don't want my skin to react or to cause anything else to stink.As far as look and feel, my Walmart jeans feel sturdier and better made. The material is light weight & thin. Not very denim-y. More like cheaper jegging material. The color isn't as nice as the pictures either, but not a deal breaker. I think they'll be comfortable for work if I can ever get to wear them. I'm giving them a night outside in the fresh air & one more wash before I give up & send them back.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not as stretchy as described
reviews.reviewText: I love these jeans. The waist is not super stretchy, which I prefer, but the legs do have some stretch. Super comfortable. I am 5'5 and the length is perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The fit was fine but the smell was horrible

These jeans fit well and are very comfortable. My only real complaint is that they smell like mothballs and I have washed them and hung them out and the smell has only faded slightly. I hope with time they will get better.
I loved the fit so much that I ordered a second pair. The second pair did not fit the same way. I still like them but the legs were definitely cut wider than the first pair.
Like the jean. Fits well as advertised. Price is right too.

I'm 5'9 and 175 lbs and bought the 10 long. I like that the long ends up being like full length pants on me. Personally I'm not a fan of every pair of pants I own to be ankle length. Very comfortable, fit my curves. No gap at the top! Will definitely purchase again!

I had tried to cancel this order but was too late. I'm glad it was. I had found some jeans on sale and decided that I didn't need this pair - I was prepared to return once they arrived but they were such a nice dark colour, fit really well and were comfortable I decided to keep. Washed well. I will likely order the lighter colour next time as well.
